item.title: Bank note button
item.dc:creator: @mistakengod mistakengod
item.description:
@mistakengod wrote:

I’ve searched on Google, nothing helped.

Added this:

[code]/* BANK NOTING */
case 85284:
if (!c.takeAsNote)
c.takeAsNote = true;
else
c.takeAsNote = false;
break;

	/**[/code]

85284 is my bank button

My items don’t note…

Read full topic
